The resulting [[ISO image|iso]] can also be installed on a USB pendrive, creating a [[Live USB|LiveUSB]] distro. <ref>{{citeweb|title=Ubuntu 8.04 USB Hard Drive install|url=http://www.pendrivelinux.com/2008/04/14/ubuntu-804-usb-hard-drive-install/|publisher=pendrivelinux.com|accessdate=2008-04-20}}</ref>
+
The resulting [[ISO image|iso]] can also be installed on a USB pendrive, creating a [[Live USB]] distro. <ref>{{citeweb|title=Ubuntu 8.04 USB Hard Drive install|url=http://www.pendrivelinux.com/2008/04/14/ubuntu-804-usb-hard-drive-install/|publisher=pendrivelinux.com|accessdate=2008-04-20}}</ref>
It has a command line version and a [[GUI]] version. It currently works with [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], [[Linux Mint]] and Klikit-Linux, and possibly more Ubuntu-based distributions. <br>
It has a command line version and a [[GUI]] version. It currently works with [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], [[Linux Mint]] and Klikit-Linux, and possibly more Ubuntu-based distributions. <br>
